clause_text: 3. 50% of the required Play Ground area may be allowed in stilt subject to condition that said carved out area will not be used for the parking or any other utility purpose by taking proper safety measures. For Hospital, Maternity Homes and Health Centre, Sanatorium, Multi- Specialty
